place_signs.signage: the name is gone but a slogan remains: 'We'll repair you all the way'

//: house mapgens of 4 to 19 from vanilla.
Basic roads imitating the original ones.

These roads - tee and curved - has sidewalks in them, used mostly inside the city. As these mapgens function as overmap terrains, we have separated them into 4 per directions - `l`eft `r`ight `u`p `d`own - to show their respected symbols in the overmap.
Fields that serves as outlines at the city's edges.
Make a transition between flesh and normal roads. Normal road will then be connected to the local roads.
